title: Poster, 1993-53-78, ca. 1980
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink on bottom: "Each uprising is more determined than the last. In Sharpeville we overcame the / consequences of disobeying the law...Soweto has been a lesson in overcoming fear of / the gun. Robert Sobukwe, late President / Pan Africanist Congress of Azania (South Africa)"
creditline: Gift of Steven Heller and Karrie Jacobs
